file_name.description: Name of the file to be processed. The location of the file depends on the context
file_name.title: File name

service_point_id.description: Service point to be used for transactions created from this file (Loans-only).
service_point_id.title: Service point ID

statistical_code.description: Statistical code (code) to be used inventory records created from this file (Instances, Holdings, Items). Specify multiple codes using multi_field_delimiter.
statistical_code.title: Statistical code

create_source_records.description: If set to true, the source records will be created in FOLIO. If set to false, the source records will not be created in FOLIO. Only applied for MARC-based transformations.
create_source_records.title: Create source records

description: The tenant ID to use when making requests to FOLIO APIs for this task, if different from library configuration
ecsTenantId.title: ECS tenant ID

organizationsCodeMapFileName.description: File name for organizations code mapping.
organizationsCodeMapFileName.title: Organizations Code Map File Name

acquisitionMethodMapFileName.description: File name for acquisition method mapping.
acquisitionMethodMapFileName.title: Acquisition Method Map File Name

paymentStatusMapFileName.description: File name for payment status mapping. By default is empty string.
paymentStatusMapFileName.title: Payment Status Map File Name

receiptStatusMapFileName.description: File name for receipt status mapping. By default is empty string.
receiptStatusMapFileName.title: Receipt Status Map File Name

workflowStatusMapFileName.description: File name for workflow status mapping. By default is empty string.
workflowStatusMapFileName.title: Workflow Status Map File Name

locationMapFileName.description: File name for location mapping. By default is empty string.
locationMapFileName.title: Location Map File Name

fundsMapFileName.description: File name for funds mapping. By default is empty string.
fundsMapFileName.title: Funds Map File Name

fundsExpenseClassMapFileName.description: File name for funds expense class mapping. By default is empty string.
fundsExpenseClassMapFileName.title: Funds Expense Class Map File Name
